scripts.build: node config-replacer.js --input index.html --output index.html && vite build && mkdir -p dist && cp -f index.html dist/index.html && if [ -d public ]; then cp -R public dist/public; fi && if [ -f public/robots.txt ]; then cp -f public/robots.txt dist/robots.txt; fi && if [ -f public/sitemap.xml ]; then cp -f public/sitemap.xml dist/sitemap.xml; fi
